title: Ratio of speeds of orbiting satellites

content.question: The speed of the satellite in orbit <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="V sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. The speed of the satellite in orbit <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="v sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. The ratio <math alttext="the fraction v sub a over v sub c" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> is

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
